mapper.select: SELECT id, session_id, message_content, message_role, message_type, message_seq, created_at, updated_at FROM message WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} AND message_type = #{messageType} ORDER BY message_seq, created_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (session_id, message_content, message_role, message_type, message_seq) VALUES (#{sessionId}, #{messageContent}, #{messageRole}, #{messageType}, #{messageSeq})
